title: Learning Analytics-Based Assessment Validity and Mathematics Learning Design Improvement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of elementary mathematics curriculum content and fundamental principles of assessment design
context.additional_context: A program for pre-/in-service elementary teachers, strengthening the capacity to improve assessment tools and design personalized learning by analyzing mathematical learning achievement.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately diagnose the validity of math assessment items with over 80% accuracy using learning analytics tools.
Learners can optimize assessment item scores (within Â±10% deviation) through learning objective (LO) weight analysis.
Learners can design three or more personalized learning feedback strategies based on student activity tracking data.
The results of clustering analysis can be interpreted to propose educational interventions necessary for addressing learning gaps.

resources: Visualization Materials for Zoom Screen Sharing
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
